entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
